snippet: “The Power of Words and Images in a World at War,” at the Grolier Club, uses the ephemera of World War II to jolt us into a more vivid understanding of the period.
abstract: Edward Rothstein reviews exhibit The Power of Words and Images in a World at War, which explores ephemera from World War II, at the Grolier Club.
lead_paragraph: “The Power of Words and Images in a World at War,” at the Grolier Club, uses the ephemera of World War II to jolt us into a more vivid understanding of the period.

headline.seo: A World War II Exhibition at the Grolier Club
